H0.text: when did 10 shilling note go out of circulation. 1968

H1.text: when did 10 shilling note go out of circulation. 1965

H2.text: when did 10 shilling note go out of circulation. 1975

H3.text: when did 10 shilling note go out of circulation. 1970

A4.text: In 1969, the 10/– note was replaced by the 50p coin, again due to inflation.

A5.text: Fearful of mass forgery by the Nazis, all notes for £10 and above ceased production, leaving the bank to issue only 10/–, £1 and £5 notes.
